TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExecutorExtensionContract implements class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract

summary.span: 定义一个可由宿主应用程序实现以扩展外接程序执行器的接口。

span.span: Defines an interface that host applications can implement to extend add-in executors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此类型的托管外接程序基础结构，不再使用，可能标记为未来版本中已过时。This type is no longer used by the managed add-in infrastructure, and may be marked obsolete in a future release.

Public Sub EntryPointStarting (assemblyName As String, startupClass As String, initArgs As IRemoteArgumentArrayContract)
public: void EntryPointStarting(System::String ^ assemblyName, System::String ^ startupClass, System::AddIn::Contract::Collections::IRemoteArgumentArrayContract ^ initArgs);
